tasks_completed: Task 1.1: Fix existing integration tests (fs/promises mocks, .md extensions, worktreeId prefix validation)
Task 1.2: Implement log-export-sanitizer.ts with 18 unit tests (HOME/CM_ROOT_DIR/CM_DB_PATH/hostname/tokens/passwords/SSH keys masking)
Task 1.3: Add sanitize query parameter to log API route
Task 1.4: Extend api-client.ts (sanitize option, cliToolId type)
Task 1.5: Add export button to LogViewer.tsx with clipboard copy and toast
Task 1.6: Add escapeHtml() to utils.ts with 10 unit tests, apply XSS prevention in LogViewer
message: Phase 1 TDD implementation complete. All 6 tasks implemented. 70 tests passing. ESLint 0 errors, TypeScript 0 errors, build success.
